articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects Amnokgang Tire Factory
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects Amnokgang Tire Factory
 Pyongyang, December 3 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un gave field guidance to the Amnokgang Tire Factory which successfully carried out the task for producing tires prioritized by the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					 He shook hands with each official and thanked them for their trouble, saying that the working class of the factory solved the issue desired by the Party and gave great courage to him by making collective innovations in a drive for building new tires, and that he came to thank them.
					
					 He looked round the room for the education in the revolutionary history.
					
					 He underscored the need for the officials and workers of the factory to bear in mind the pride and honor of living and working at the glorious factory which was associated with warm love of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and to bring about fresh miracles and innovations in production, so as to add eternal luster to the undying leadership exploits performed by the great leaders for making the industry of tire Juche-based.
					
					 He went round all kinds of tires made at the factory and the newly developed large-size tires ready for the ballistic rocket self-propelled launching vehicle. 
					
					 He gave the task of manufacturing without fail the large-size tire for the 9-axis self-propelled launching vehicle of our own style to the factory in September while he energetically guided preparations for a "great event in November".
					
					 The officials and working class brilliantly carried out the order given by the Party by waging a courageous production campaign despite bottlenecks and difficulties under the uplifted banner of self-reliance.
					
					 The Supreme Leader said he was greatly impressed to see the fighting spirit and working manner of the officials and working class who had established the new production process of large-size tire with domestic products, not depending upon imported equipment, in a revolutionary way and in a short time, and manufactured the new-type large-size tires, far superior to imports in their physical and mechanical properties. He expressed deep thanks to them in the name of the Central Committee of the WPK.
					
					 He went round various places of the factory to learn in detail about production and management.
					
					 He gave valuable instructions over the management of the factory. The tasks facing the factory included the issue of raising the production to a higher level by properly organizing economic work to meet the requirements of the present stirring times in which victorious advance is accelerated on all fronts of socialist construction, the issue of newly designing and upgrading the production process according to the trends of tire industry developing worldwide, the issue of pushing ahead with the supply of raw and other materials for putting production on a normal track, the issue of preparing the employees as intelligent workers equipped with modern scientific and technological knowledge and the issue of paying deep attention to the work for providing the workers with better living conditions.
					
					 He said that it is necessary to turn out automobiles and other rolling stocks and manufacture all sorts of tires for them by our own energy, technology and materials, in order to satisfy the daily-increasing needs in developing the country's economy and beefing up national defense capabilities, and therefore the factory must be upgraded to be state-of-the-art one in line with the requirements of the era of the knowledge-based economy.
					
					 The Supreme Leader expressed expectation and belief that the officials and working class of the factory would proactively contribute to implementing the WPK's line of simultaneously developing the two fronts, and had a photo session with labor innovators.
					
					 Accompanying him were Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK, and Hong Yong Chil, Jo Yong Won and Yu Jin, leading officials of the C.C., WPK.

articles.title: U.S. and S. Korean Puppet Forces' Projected Aerial Drill Will Be Followed by Merciless Retaliation: CPRC Spokesman
articles.content:
U.S. and S. Korean Puppet Forces' Projected Aerial Drill Will Be Followed by Merciless Retaliation: CPRC Spokesman
 Pyongyang, December 3 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of the Country of the DPRK (CPRC) released a statement on Sunday in connection with the fact that the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces are going to launch the largest-ever joint aerial drill to "totally destroy" the DPRK on Dec. 4.
					 The statement says:
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces are asserting that the planned drill will be "the largest-ever one for blowing up 700 odd primary objects of the north including nuclear facilities and missile bases" and that it will serve as "maximum pressure on the north" as it will be an "unheard-of strike action" involving formations of latest fighter jets called "the king of air battle."
					
					 What matters is the fact that the drill simulating an actual war is to be staged at a time when insane President Trump is running wild, terming the DPRK's ICBM test-fire "action never to be pardonable" and bluffing as if he would do "anything in response," stunned by the DPRK's realization of the great historic cause of completing the state nuclear force and the cause of building a rocket power.
					
					 The projected war rehearsal is just a grave military provocation which will push the already acute situation on the Korean peninsula to the brink of nuclear war.
					
					 The situation clearly proves that the U.S. and the south Korean puppet war maniacs are just aggressors and provocateurs breaking peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and in the region and that the DPRK was entirely just when it decided to invariably take the path of simultaneously developing the two fronts in order to bolster up its war deterrent in every way.
					
					 Taking this opportunity, the DPRK cannot but remind the aggressors once again of the statement made by the chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK on Sept. 21 that the DPRK would seriously consider the taking of a highest-level hard-line countermeasure in history to cope with the U.S. and its vassal forces' reckless moves against the state and people of the DPRK and would surely force them to pay dearly for their provocations.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean puppet military warmongers should bear in mind that their escalating provocation and adding to crimes will only invite more terrible retaliation and precipitate their self-destruction.

articles.title: Provincial Army-People Rallies Held to Hail Successful ICBM Test-fire
articles.content:
Provincial Army-People Rallies Held to Hail Successful ICBM Test-fire
 Pyongyang, December 3 (KCNA) -- There took place army-civilian joint meetings in South Phyongan, Hwanghae and Hamgyong provinces on Saturday and Sunday to celebrate the great victory of completing the state nuclear force, the cause of building a rocket power, under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The meetings were attended by officials of local party and power organs, working people's organizations, factories, enterprises, farms and universities, men and officers of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces and inhabitants from all walks of life including youths and students.
					
					 A statement of the government of the DPRK was read out at the meetings to be followed by speeches.
					
					 Speakers said the success of the new type ICBM Hwasong-15 test-fire conducted according to the political and strategic decision of the WPK was an auspicious event of all the people which gave birth to the tremendous might of putting the strategic position of the DPRK on the highest level and demonstrated to the world the invincible might of socialist Korea.
					
					 They extended the highest glory and warmest congratulations to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un who added glory to the dignity of the powerful country and laid an eternal foundation for its rosy future by realizing the great historic cause of completing the state nuclear force.
					
					 They called for making a great upsurge at all worksites for improving the people's standard of living by turning out in the death-defying struggle for the Party and the revolution, the country and its people like those in the field of defence science, and thus successfully conclude the drive of this year full of national jubilees.
					
					 The revolutionary forces of the DPRK will wipe the U.S. off the face of the earth if the U.S. imperialists unleash a nuclear war on this land, they added.

articles.title: Int'l Day of Persons with Disabilities Marked in DPRK
articles.content:
Int'l Day of Persons with Disabilities Marked in DPRK
 Pyongyang, December 3 (KCNA) -- There took place a meeting at the Central Youth Hall Sunday, the international day of persons with disabilities.
					 Attending it were Kim Mun Chol, chairman of the Central Committee of the Korean Federation for the Protection of the Disabled, and officials of the relevant units, disabled persons and their family members and Pyongyangites, staff members of the diplomatic and international body missions here and overseas Koreans staying here.
					
					 The participants watched the video on the achievements made in the protection of the disabled in 2017 and enjoyed an art performance given by disabled persons.
					
					 Put on the stage were female trio "Snowflake of Yearning", light music "Pyongyang Is Best", dance "Ongheya" etc.
					
					 Through female solos "We Call You Father", "Oh Party, It's Thanks to Your Care", etc. the performers expressed their gratitude to the great mother party taking care of all children.
					
					 Prior to the meeting, they looked round the photos dealing with happy images of disabled persons.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts U.S.-S. Korea Joint Aerial Drill against DPRK.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts U.S.-S. Korea Joint Aerial Drill against DPRK
Pyongyang, December 3 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and south Korean puppet forces are going to stage the largest-ever joint aerial drill Vigilant Ace simulating invasion of the DPRK from Dec. 4 to 8.
					More than 230 fighters of different missions including the ultramodern stealth fighters F-22 Raptor, F-35A, F-35B and other fighters of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces and fighters of the south Korean puppet air force and over tens of thousands of troops including 12,000 U.S. troops are to be involved in the drill.
					
					Rodong Sinmun Sunday in a commentary says this shows well that the enemies' moves to start a nuclear war have reached a dangerous stage as they are a grave military provocation against the DPRK.
					
					The commentary goes on:
					
					Such drill is a dangerous provocation as it is driving the tension on the Korean peninsula to the brink of a nuclear war.
					
					It is an open, all-out provocation against the DPRK, which may lead to a nuclear war any moment.
					
					The U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces are so foolish as to run amuck with such stealth fighters.
					
					The stealth fighters which the enemies boast so much of will not escape the fate of a tiger moth.
					
					The U.S. and south Korean puppet warmongers would be well advised to bear in mind that their DPRK-targeted military drill will be as foolish an act as precipitating their self-destruction.

articles.title: Minju Joson Hits out at S. Korean Puppet Regime's Servile Attitude
articles.content:
Minju Joson Hits out at S. Korean Puppet Regime's Servile Attitude
 Pyongyang, December 3 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime held a meeting of the joint committee of SOFA.
					 The puppet regime, in a bid to calm down the ever-growing anti-U.S. sentiments among south Koreans, asked the U.S. to make public the matters discussed at the meeting such as reparation for the crimes committed by GIs and purification of the seriously polluted U.S. military bases. However, the U.S. refused to do so. In connection with the issue of opening to public the contents of the discussion, the U.S. called for making public only information not pertaining to "military secrets." About the issue of reparation for the crimes committed by GIs, it turned down the puppet regime's proposal by stressing the need to "intensify preventive efforts and mutual cooperation." It also rejected the issue of sharing the burden for de-pollution of the U.S. forces' bases in south Korea, calling for continuing "constructive discussion."
					
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Sunday says:
					
					 The above-said fact clearly shows that the meeting of the joint committee of SOFA is little short of the disgraceful epitome between the master and his servant run through with domination and subjugation, pressure and submission.
					
					 SOFA is just a document of aggression legally allowing the U.S. imperialists' military presence in south Korea and the one of disgrace mercilessly violating the dignity and interests of the south Korean people.
					
					 This being a hard fact, the puppet regime is kowtowing to the U.S., touting "joint efforts for intensifying alliance." Such servile behavior is reminiscent of fools.
					
					 The puppet authorities of south Korea should face up to the demand of the candlelight demonstrators for independence against the U.S.
					
					 If they persist in confrontation with fellow countrymen and sycophancy toward the U.S., depending on the "alliance" with it and begging for its forces' eternal presence, they will never be able to escape a miserable end like its predecessors.

articles.title: S. Korean Body Demands Release of Prisoners of Conscience
articles.content:
S. Korean Body Demands Release of Prisoners of Conscience
 Pyongyang, December 3 (KCNA) -- The Family Movement for Realizing Democracy in south Korea held the 1147th Thursday rally in Seoul on Nov. 30, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Jaju Sibo.
					 Speakers at the rally blamed the Intelligence Service for keeping mum about the forcible dissolution of the Unified Progressive Party and the case of Ri Sok Gi's plotted rebellion.
					
					 They deplored that the prisoners of conscience who are the biggest victims by the Park Geun Hye regime are still in prison.
					
					 They expressed their will to carry on their actions for the dissolution of the IS and abrogation of the "Security Law."
					
					 The "issue of north's nukes" was raised by the hostile policy toward the north, they said, urging the U.S. to roll back the policy of stifling the north but to recognize it and hold dialogue and negotiations with it.

articles.title: S. Korean Bodies Protest against Japan's Move to Cover Up Its Past Crimes.
articles.content:
S. Korean Bodies Protest against Japan's Move to Cover Up Its Past Crimes.
 Pyongyang, December 3 (KCNA) -- organizations of south Korea held a news conference before the Japanese embassy in Seoul on Nov. 30 to protest against Japan's black-hearted move to cover up the act of imposing forced labor on Koreans in the past, according to the south Korean online paper Tongil News.
					 Speakers recalled that the Japanese authorities are not going to build a center to inform the people of the past forced labor at the Hashima Coal Mine.
					
					 Noting that Japan has never apologized for the crimes during its colonial rule over Korea, the speakers expressed their will to fight till Japan makes an apology for the crimes.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from Chongryon Central Standing Committee
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from Chongryon Central Standing Committee
 Pyongyang, December 3 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a letter from the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on Nov. 30 in connection with the successful test-fire of Hwasong-15.
					 The letter said that such inspiring heroic feats performed this year as the "March 18 revolution," "July 4 revolution," miraculous July 28 victory, successful test of H-bomb, which meant for ICBM, and successful test-fire of Hwasong-15 capable of tipping super-size nuclear warhead that can strike the whole U.S. mainland are the special, great events which could be achieved only by Kim Jong Un, a peerlessly great man born of Heaven, and the greatest events to be recorded forever in the 5,000-year history of the nation.
					
					 The letter extended the highest and greatest glory to Kim Jong Un who frightened old lunatic Trump and his stooges by successfully achieving the historic great cause of completing the state nuclear force, reflecting the loyalty of the Chongryon officials and other Koreans in Japan to him.
					
					 All the Chongryon officials and other Korean residents in Japan are full of the confidence that as long as Kim Jong Un who put an end to the aggression and nuclear threat from the U.S. imperialists and other imperialists through the realization of the historic great cause of completing the state nuclear force, shouldering upon himself the destiny of the country and its people, a final victory is in store for the DPRK.
					
					 The letter expressed the determination of Chongryon to share their fate with Kim Jong Un who is ushering in a new chapter of independence in the world politics history, fully demonstrating to the world the dignity and might of the world's political power and military power, and to make more strenuous efforts to devotedly defend the leader, the country and Chongryon by remaining loyal to him forever.

articles.title: European Regional Headquarters of Pomminryon Hails Successful ICBM Test-fire
articles.content:
European Regional Headquarters of Pomminryon Hails Successful ICBM Test-fire
 Pyongyang, December 3 (KCNA) -- The European Regional Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) released a statement on Nov. 30 congratulating the DPRK on its successful test-fire of ICBM Hwasong-15.
					 The statement said the declaration of the success in the test-fire of ICBM Hwasong-15 on Nov. 29, 2017 was the declaration of the victory of the great idea of independence to be specially recorded in the history of the Korean nation spanning 5,000 years which instills boundless national pride into all Koreans living abroad.
					
					 Noting the Korean nation has become to take the path of self-development, not reading others' face, free from the nuclear blackmails and threat of nuclear preemptive attack posed by the U.S. for more than seven decades, the statement stressed:
					
					 Peace and stability can be achieved on the Korean peninsula when the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration are implemented.
					
					 There is nothing to be afraid of if all Koreans pool their independent efforts and wisdom. The great success in the test-fire of the ICBM Hwansong-15 is, indeed, a glory and hurrah of the independent nation.

articles.title: Nepalese Committee for Remembering Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Meets
articles.content:
Nepalese Committee for Remembering Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Meets
 Pyongyang, December 3 (KCNA) -- A meeting of the Nepalese National Committee for Remembering President Kim Il Sung and Leader Kim Jong Il took place at the building of the Central Committee of the Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist) on Nov. 22.
					 Present at the meeting were personages of political and social circles of Nepal.
					
					 The meeting discussed and decided the issues of holding political and cultural events such as a seminar, book and photo exhibition and film show under the sponsorship of the remembrance committee and giving wide publicity to the noble career and revolutionary exploits of the peerlessly great persons on the occasion of the 6th anniversary of demise of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Adopted there was an appeal sent by the committee to the friendly and solidarity organizations with the Korean people in different countries of the world.
					
					 The appeal said that Dec. 17, 2017 marks the 6th anniversary of demise of HE Kim Jong Il, eternal head of the Workers' Party of Korea and great leader of the Korean people. It went on:
					
					 HE Kim Jong Il, who was born in Mt Paektu, the holy mountain of Korea, and grew up in the flames of the anti-Japanese war, had successfully assisted the great leader President Kim Il Sung in his work for a long period as his most faithful assistant and revolutionary comrade.
					
					 He conducted energetic activities for the victory of the socialist cause, world peace and stability and friendship and solidarity with world people under the uplifted banner of independence against imperialism, demonstrated the dignity of the DPRK and made a great contribution to accomplishing the human cause of independence.
					
					 His exploits will be eternally cherished in the hearts of humankind.
					
					 The appeal called upon the friendly and solidarity organizations with the Korean people in the world to organize remembrance committees and hold events to praise his revolutionary career and exploits.

articles.title: Political Party of DR Congo Signs Pyongyang Declaration
articles.content:
Political Party of DR Congo Signs Pyongyang Declaration
 Pyongyang, December 3 (KCNA) -- The Convention of United Democratic Congolese signed the Pyongyang Declaration "Let Us Defend and Advance the Cause of Socialism."
					 At an urgent special meeting of the party held on Nov. 28 the Pyongyang Declaration was read out and National Chairman Omer Muswanza Ni Munjundou signed the declaration.
					
					 Conveying the signed document to the DPRK mission in DR Congo, the national chairman said:
					
					 We are greatly honored to have signed and conveyed the historical declaration to mark the 26th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's assumption of the Supreme Commandership of the Korean People's Army, the 6th anniversary of respected Marshal Kim Jong Un's assumption of the KPA Supreme Commandership and the 100th birth anniversary of anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk.
					
					 The document also represents a gift presented by us to Comrade Kim Il Sung, founder of socialist Korea, Comrade Kim Jong Il who proved the scientific accuracy and truth of socialism, and Comrade Kim Jong Un who is fully displaying the might of the DPRK as a powerful nation.
					
					 Our party will stand by the Workers' Party of Korea advancing under the uplifted banner of socialism.

articles.title: Document Supporting Korea's Peace and Reunification Adopted by Brazilian Communist Party
articles.content:
Document Supporting Korea's Peace and Reunification Adopted by Brazilian Communist Party
 Pyongyang, December 3 (KCNA) -- A document supporting peace and reunification of the Korean peninsula was adopted at the final plenary meeting of the 14th Congress of the Brazilian Communist Party on Nov. 19.
					 The document blasted the U.S. imperialists for infringing upon the sovereignty of the DPRK and interfering in the issue of the Korean peninsula. It went on:
					
					 The Brazilian Communist Party supports Korea's reunification and the DPRK's proposal on replacing the armistice agreement with a peace accord.
					
					 The document flayed the U.S. president's rubbish calling for "total destruction" of the DPRK.

articles.title: Successful Test-Fire of Hwasong-15 Hailed by Indian, Nigerian Figures
articles.content:
Successful Test-Fire of Hwasong-15 Hailed by Indian, Nigerian Figures
 Pyongyang, December 3 (KCNA) -- Personages of India and Nigeria issued statements on Nov. 29 in congratulation of the DPRK's successful test-fire of ICBM Hwasong-15.
					 Atul Kumar Anjan, secretary of the National Council of the Communist Party of India, and Suneet Chopra, joint secretary of the All India Agricultural Workers' Union, said in their joint statement that they extended warm congratulations to the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people who successfully conducted a test-fire of ICBM Hwasong-15. It went on:
					
					 We fully support the statement of the DPRK government in which it proclaimed the accomplishment of the historic and great cause of completing the state nuclear force and the cause of building a rocket power through its recent test-fire and solemnly clarified once again that the development of its strategic weapons would not pose any threat to any country and region as long as its interests are not infringed upon.
					
					 Availing ourselves of this opportunity, we strongly condemn the persistent nuclear war threat by the U.S. destroying peace and stability of the Korean peninsula.
					
					 We also assert that the UN should provide the settlement for putting an end to the situation in which the Korean peninsula is technically at war and make the U.S. not infringe sovereign states' right to independence any longer.
					
					 Damian Ogbonna, national chairman of the People's Progressive Party of Nigeria who doubles as chairman of the African Regional Committee for Friendship and Solidarity with the Korean People, said in a statement that the successful test-fire of the new-type ICBM Hwasong-15 clearly proved once again that nobody could block the road ahead of the Korean people who are dynamically advancing along the road of independence, Songun and socialism, united close around HE Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Reported in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Reported in Russia
 Pyongyang, December 3 (KCNA) -- DV-Ros News Service of Russia on Nov. 26 reported the full text of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us March Forward Dynamically towards Final Victory, Holding Higher the Banner of Songun".
					 The work, published on April 15, Juche 101 (2012), says that the 100-year history of Kim Il Sung's nation clearly proves the immutable truth that an outstanding leader assures the dignity and prosperity of the country and the nation.
					
					 It sets forth the tasks for glorifying the dignity of Songun Korea for all ages and successfully realizing the cause of building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 The news service carried a photo of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige sobre el terreno la Fabrica de Neumaticos Amnokgang
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige sobre el terreno la Fabrica de Neumaticos Amnokgang
Pyongyang, 3 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un dirigio sobre el terreno la Fabrica de Neumaticos Amnokgang que cumplio con exito la tarea de produccion de neumaticos a que dio gran atencion el partido.
					Tomando una y otra las manos de los funcionarios de la fabrica, dijo que ha venido para agradecer a los obreros de la fabrica quienes le dieron el gran animo al resolver el problema deseado con ansiedad por el partido creando la innovacion colectiva en la produccion de nuevos neumaticos y evaluo altamente sus meritos.
					
					Primero, el Maximo Dirigente estuvo en la sala de educacion de la historia revolucionaria.
					
					Alli, enfatizo que los funcionarios y obreros de la fabrica deben crear nuevos milagros e innovaciones en la produccion de neumaticos guardando en lo profundo del corazon el orgullo y dignidad de trabajar en el lugar donde estan impregnadas las huellas del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y glorificar eternamente sus proezas inmortales dedicadas al trabajo para realizar la jucheanizacion de la industria de neumaticos.
					
					Paso revista a los neumaticos de diversos generos producidos en la fabrica y otros de gran tamano para el camion con plataforma de lanzamiento autopropulsado, fabricado recientemente.
					
					En septiembre pasado cuando dirigia con entusiasmo los preparativos para el "gran acontecimiento de noviembre", dio a esta fabrica la tarea de inventar y producir incondicionalmente los neumaticos de gran tamano para el camion de 9 ejes con plataforma de lanzamiento de peculiaridad coreana.
					
					Bajo la bandera del apoyo en sus propias fuerzas, los funcionarios y obreros de la fabrica desarrollaron la tenaz campana superando las dificultades y pruebas y cumplieron con exito la orden del partido.
					
					Se sintio gran emocion ante el coraje y modo de trabajo de los funcionarios y obreros de la fabrica quienes acondicionaron en un corto lapso y de manera revolucionaria el nuevo proceso de produccion de neumaticos de gran tamano con las instalaciones nacionales sin apoyarse en los equipos extranjeros y elaboraron los neumaticos de gran tamano de nuevo tipo, cuyos principales caracteres fisicos y mecanicos son mejores que los neumaticos importados, dijo el Maximo Dirigente y acoto que les da el agradecimiento calido en nombre del Comite Central del PTC.
					
					Recorriendo varios lugares de la fabrica, el Maximo Dirigente se cercioro en detalles del estado de produccion y gestion.
					
					Dio las instrucciones valiosas para la administracion de la fabrica sobre los problemas de llevar al nivel mas alto la produccion de neumaticos al organizar bien las labores economicas conforme a los requisitos de la actual epoca conmovedora en que se acelera el avance victorioso en todos los campos de la construccion socialista, disenar de manera original y modernizar los procesos productivos de acuerdo con la tendencia de desarrollo de la industria de neumaticos, impulsar incesantemente los trabajos para tomar las medidas suficientes de aseguramiento de materias primas y materiales por la normalizacion productiva, formar a los empleados como personales dotados de las ciencias y tecnicas modernas, prestar la profunda atencion a los trabajos para ofrecer las mejores condiciones de vida a los obreros, etc.
					
					Puntualizo que a fin de desarrollar la economia del pais y fortalecer la capacidad de defensa nacional, hace falta producir con las propias fuerzas los automoviles como el camion y satisfacer la cada dia mas creciente demanda de neumaticos produciendolos con nuestra fuerza, tecnica y materiales. Y anadio que para este fin hay que reconstruir de manera moderna la fabrica segun las demandas de la epoca de economia intelectual.
					
					Expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que los funcionarios y obreros de la fabrica contribuiran activamente a la materializacion de la linea de desarrollo paralelo del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y se fotografio junto a los innovadores laborales.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente fue acompanado con Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC, vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y del CC del PTC, y los cuadros directivos del CC del PTC, Hong Yong Chil, Jo Yong Won y Yu Jin.

articles.title: Portavoz de CRPP advierte a belicistas norteamericanos y surcoreanos
articles.content:
Portavoz de CRPP advierte a belicistas norteamericanos y surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 3 de diciembre (ACNC) -- En relacion con que los belicistas de EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea libraran desde el dia 4 los ejercicios conjuntos aereos de gran envergadura para "exterminar" a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria hizo publica el dia 3 la siguiente declaracion:
					EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos disparatean que este simulacro combinado aereo "sera el entrenamiento sin precedentes para reducir a cenizas mas de 700 blancos principales del Norte (de Corea) inclusive las instalaciones nucleares y las bases de misiles" y dara la "maxima presion al Norte de Corea" siendo la "accion de ataque nunca vista" donde se movilizan las aviaciones sofisticadas que se llaman como "rey del combate aereo".
					
					Lo problematico del caso es que este entrenamiento se coincide con las desesperaciones del demente mandatario norteamericano Trump, que solto que "no perdonara jamas" y "hara algo", desafiando a la realizacion de la gran causa historica de la RPDC de completar las fuerzas armadas nucleares del Estado y de convertir en la potencia coheteril.
					
					Las presentes maniobras militares devienen la grave provocacion militar que lleva la ya tensa situacion de la Peninsula Coreana al umbral de guerra nuclear.
					
					La realidad muestra claramente que los belicistas norteamericanos y surcoreanos son precisamente los agresores y provocadores que destruyen la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y la region, y que es muy justo lo que la RPDC consolido por todos los medios el poderoso disuasivo de guerra manteniendo la linea de desarrollo paralelo de la construccion de las fuerzas armadas nucleares y la economica.
					
					En esta ocasion hacemos recordar otra vez la declaracion fechada el 21 de septiembre del Presidente del Comite de Estado de la RPDC quien anuncio que tomaremos en seria consideracion la ejecucion decisiva de la contramedida superintransigente sin precedente en la historia para hacer frente a las locuras de EE.UU. y sus satelites contra nuestro Estado y pueblo y hara pagarles sin falta el precio caro.
					
					Los belicistas norteamericanos y surcoreanos deben saber correctamente que se acelera la hora de su autodestruccion tragica, mientras intensifiquen las provocaciones y amontonen los crimenes.

articles.title: Mitines en provincias coreanas para festejar el lanzamiento de "Hwasong-15"
articles.content:
Mitines en provincias coreanas para festejar el lanzamiento de "Hwasong-15"
Pyongyang, 3 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar los dias 2 y 3 en las provincias de Phyong-an del Sur, Hwanghae del Sur y Hamgyong del Sur los mitines conjuntos de militares y civiles para celebrar la gran victoria que llevo a feliz termino la historica causa de perfeccionamiento de las fuerzas armadas nucleares del Estado y la de conversion del pais en una potencia coheteril, bajo la guia del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					Tomaron parte en las ocasiones los funcionarios de las instituciones del partido y el poder, las entidades de masas, fabricas, empresas, granjas y universidades, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, los trabajadores de diversos estratos, los jovenes y estudiantes de las respectivas localidades.
					
					En los mitines se dio lectura a la declaracion del gobierno de la RPDC y hubo discursos de felicitacion.
					
					Los oradores apuntaron que el pleno exito del lanzamiento de prueba del ICBM "Hwasong-15" de nuevo tipo, ejecutado segun la decision politica y estrategica del PTC, deviene gran jubilo de todo el pueblo, que produjo una fuerza poderosa que asento en el plano cimero la posicion estrategica de la RPDC, y un evento de capital importancia que puso de pleno manifiesto el impetu invencible de la Corea socialista.
					
					Rindieron la maximo gloria y las mas calurosas felicitaciones al Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un quien aseguro la dignidad y el futuro siempre prometedor de Corea al cumplir la historica causa de completar las fuerzas armadas nucleares del Estado.
					
					Llamaron a levantarse en la lucha decisiva por el partido y la revolucion, la patria y el pueblo, al igual que los combatientes del sector de ciencias de defensa nacional, con vistas a producir gran auge en todos los sectores para la construccion de potencia economica y civilizada y el mejoramiento de la vida poblacional, de modo que se concluya con exito el presente ano lleno de acontecimientos historicos para la nacion coreana.
					
					Tomaron la decision de eliminar en la Tierra el territorio norteamericano si los bandidescos imperialistas yanquis desatan la guerra nuclear en la tierra patria.

articles.title: Minju Joson denuncia servilismo del Sur de Corea a EE.UU.
articles.content:
Minju Joson denuncia servilismo del Sur de Corea a EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 3 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Hace poco, EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos convocaron una reunion del comite conjunto EE.UU.-Sudcorea del "Acuerdo sobre el Estatus de las Fuerzas" ("Acuerdo Administrativo").
					En la ocasion, para calmar el cada vez mas creciente sentimiento antiyanqui de la poblacion, la parte surcoreana exigio a su amo gringo dar publicidad los problemas discutidos  tales como la indemnizacion a las victimas de crimenes cometidos por las tropas norteamericanas, la purificacion de la contaminacion ambiental de las bases militares norteamericanas, etc. 
					
					Pero, en cuanto a dar a luz el contenido de la reunion, la parte norteamericana insistio en la publicacion de las informaciones excepto los "secretos militares", negando asi la exigencia de su contraparte y en cuanto a la indemnizacion, dijo que "haran esfuerzos para prevenir los delitos y estrecharan las cooperaciones entre ambas partes", haciendo asi a su interlocutor callar. Tambien dio espalda a la demanda de la carga mutua de los gastos necesarios para eliminar la contaminacion ambiental de las bases militares norteamericanas, diciendo de la necesidad de "continuar la discusion constructiva".
					
					En un comentario individual divulgado el dia 3, el periodico Minju Joson subraya que esta reunion revela patentemente las relaciones ignominiosas entre el amo y el sirviente, o sea, entre la dominacion y la subyugacion y entre la coaccion y la sumision, y continua:
					
					El "Acuerdo Administrativo" EE.UU.-Sudcorea es el documento agresivo que permite legalmente a los imperialistas norteamericanos su ocupacion militar en el Sur de Corea y el vergonzoso que pisotea cruelmente la dignidad y los intereses de la poblacion surcoreana.
					
					Sin embargo, los imbeciles surcoreanos adulan a su patron norteamericano hablando de los "esfuerzos comunes por el fortalecimiento de la alianza".
					
					Las autoridades surcoreanas deben ver correctamente la opinion publica con velas encendidas que demanda la independencia antiyanqui.
					
					Si ellas siguen recurriendo a la confrontacion fratricida y el servilismo proyanqui depositando su destino en la "alianza" con EE.UU. y urgiendo la ocupacion permanente de EE.UU., repetiran el fin tragico de sus predecesores.
